descripcion: We are looking for a software engineer with experience in web development and knowledge of JavaScript, React, and Node.js. The ideal candidate must be able to work in a team and have good communication skills.
We are looking for a data analyst with experience in handling large datasets and visualization tools. Knowledge of SQL, Python, and R is required.
We are looking for a mobile applications developer with experience in iOS and/or Android. The candidate must have knowledge of Swift, Kotlin, and user interface development.
We are looking for a DevOps engineer with experience in managing cloud infrastructures, process automation, and continuous integration tools. Knowledge of AWS, Azure, or GCP is required.
We are looking for a UX/UI designer with a passion for creating exceptional digital experiences. Experience in Figma, user-centered design, and collaboration with development teams is required.
We are looking for a database administrator with experience in PostgreSQL and MySQL. The candidate must ensure the availability, security, and performance of production databases.
We are looking for a cybersecurity specialist with knowledge in infrastructure protection, vulnerability analysis, and incident response. Experience with SIEM and security certifications is a plus.
We are looking for a Product Manager with experience in defining and launching digital products. Analytical skills, leadership, and knowledge of agile methodologies are required.
We are looking for a frontend developer with experience in React, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS. Knowledge of performance optimization and web accessibility is a plus.
We are looking for a backend developer with experience in Node.js, Express, and NoSQL databases. Knowledge of microservices architecture is required.
We are looking for a machine learning engineer with experience in predictive modeling and data processing. Knowledge of TensorFlow, PyTorch, and MLOps is a plus.
We are looking for a QA engineer with experience in test automation using tools like Selenium, Cypress, or Playwright. Desired knowledge in CI/CD.
We are looking for a system administrator with experience in Linux, Docker, and server monitoring. Knowledge of Bash or Python scripting will be a plus.
We are looking for a Scrum Master with experience in agile methodologies and managing multidisciplinary teams. Scrum Master certification is desirable.
We are looking for a support technician with skills in incident resolution, networking, and operating systems. Attention to detail and excellent user interaction are required.
